release_note: We have made improvements to reduce the amount of communication.
Fixed an issue where posts were slow to display on the user details screen.
We have reduced the amount of communication.
We have made internal system improvements.
Minor bug fixes and optimizations were made.
Fixed an issue where the app would crash when trying to post a voice.
Fixed an issue where the message list was difficult to update.
Fixed an issue where image sending via DM would fail and an issue where the number of DM notifications would deviate.
Fixed an issue where it was not possible to send PNG images via DM.
We ve made some minor improvements.
You can now select the posts that are displayed in All . Other bugs have been fixed.
You can now include up to 4 photos in your posts only compatible with iOS14 .
We have improved the operation speed and fixed some bugs.
We ve made some minor improvements.
You can now see past posts and post destinations on the favorites screen.
You can now rearrange the bulletin board.
You can now delete the block list and mute list at once. Other improvements have been made.
Added popularity order to the search screen.
Added block list and mute list.
Added the ability to favorite users. Also the operation speed has been improved.
Implemented a notification screen for likes and replies. Various other improvements have been made.
You can now see past posts.
The number of replies on the bulletin board is now displayed.
The number of unread messages is now displayed.
